chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 Pro has the above problem:

The phone simply gave up without a drop, water damage, or external interference. It can no longer be turned on, and the data on the phone appears to be lost. Please request reimbursement of costs under warranty. Best regards, Mattias Malki

Thank you for your help,

Hallo,

der Verkäufer kann die Rücksendung aufgrund des folgenden Problems noch nicht durchführen: Produkt mit iCloud/Google verknüpft.
Er hat weitere Details in dieser Nachricht hinterlegt: Dear Backcare,

The device is currently locked by the customer's iCloud account. Inform the customer to unlink their account or we will not be able to proceed with the repair. Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Dear ecomobile

customer reports the following:

We say that the connection to the cell phone is deleted as soon as an internet connection is established.

Regards,
Nisa from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

The iCloud still seems to be linked to the customer's phone. Do let me know once the customer has unlinked the iCloud, if he requires any assistance, he can use this link for help: https://support.apple.com/de-de/guide/icloud/mmfc0eeddd/icloud

Regards,
CH

Dear ecomobile,

customer reports the following:

We say that the connection to the cell phone is deleted as soon as an internet connection is established.

Kind regards,
Nisa from Back Market

Hallo,

der Verkäufer kann die Rücksendung aufgrund des folgenden Problems noch nicht durchführen: Produkt mit iCloud/Google verknüpft.
Er hat weitere Details in dieser Nachricht hinterlegt: Dear Backcare, 

It has come to our attention that the device is locked with the customer's iCloud account, hence we are unable to proceed. We require the customer to unlink their iCloud account from the phone.
Kindly request the customer's help to resolve this issue. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
KW

Dear ecomobile

Have you tried to connect the device to the internet?

The customer states, that as soon as the device is connected to the internet, the iCloud will be removed.

Best regards,
Antonio from the Back Care Team

Hallo,

der Verkäufer kann die Rücksendung aufgrund des folgenden Problems noch nicht durchführen: Produkt mit iCloud/Google verknüpft.
Er hat weitere Details in dieser Nachricht hinterlegt: Dear Backcare,

It has come to our attention that the device is locked with the customer's iCloud account, hence we are unable to proceed. We require the customer to unlink their iCloud account from the phone.
Kindly request the customer's help to resolve this issue. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
KW

Dear ecomobile

The device is now disconnected.

Please proceed within the deadlines.

Best regards,
Antonio from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Thank you for the confirmation, we will relay this information to our repair team and inform you of any updates

Regards,
JH

Dear Backcare,

We have confirmed that the iCloud has been unlocked. Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue and we do not have any available stocks for replacement. Instead, we have refunded the customer.

Regards,
JH
